About me Nexi8 (PL)

How I Work

I build things that solve real problems - currently in HRTech - while sharing what I learn about AI through training and workshops.

I believe in understanding principles over chasing trends, in practical implementation over theory, and in being someone who can judge what makes sense for your specific situation.

Open to connections, collaborations, and conversations with fellow builders and founders.
